name: This is a Java Courses
discripetion: Java is a general-purpose, class-based, object-oriented programming language designed for having lesser implementation dependencies. It is a computing platform for application development.collection of programs that help programmers to develop and run Java programming applications efficiently. It includes an execution engine, a compiler, and a set of libraries in it.  centers, game consoles, scientific supercomputers, cell phones, etc.

name: This is a Python Courses
discripetion: Python is an interpreted, object-oriented, high-level programming language with dynamic semantics. Its high-level built in data structures, combined with dynamic typing and dynamic binding, make it very attractive for Rapid Application Development, as well as for use as a scripting or glue language to connect existing components together. Python's simple, easy to learn syntax emphasizes readability and therefore reduces the cost of program maintenance.

name: PHP Courese
discripetion: The abbreviation PHP initially stood for Personal Homepage. But now it is a recursive acronym for Hypertext Preprocessor. It's recursive in the sense that the first word itself is an abbreviation, so the full meaning doesn't follow the abbreviation.

name: This is a JavaScript Courses
discripetion: Many browsers use JavaScript as a scripting language for doing dynamic things on the web. Any time you see a click-to-show dropdown menu, extra content added to a page, and dynamically changing element colors on a page, to name a few features, you're seeing the effects of JavaScript.Without JavaScript, all you would have on the web would be HTML and CSS. name: This is a Ruby Courses
discripetion: The Ruby programming language is a highly portable general-purpose language that serves many purposes.Ruby is great for building desktop applications, static websites, data processing services, and even automation tools. It used for web servers, DevOps, and web scraping and crawling. And when you add in the functionality of the Rails application framework, you can do even more, especially database-driven web applications.

name: C++ Courese
discripetion: The problem with these languages was that they were targeted at a certain group of people â€“ FORTRAN for engineers and scientists and COBOL for business people.Then during the 60s a new language called Simula surfaced and introduced the concept of a class, which sort of let anyone make software for their special fields.
